title: Twisted Fate High Noon "Ult" Whistle
body:
Since Twisted Fate's High Noon is based of wild west.. I really think Riot should add the Wild west duel Wistle.. When he activates the ult, the first part plays then when he ports the second part plays.. I think this would be awesome if riot added this.

Thanks :)

(p.s. not originally my idea, someone was talking about it and I really liked the idea)

replies.body: Yes this is a fantastic idea!
